doc:
"Brad Johnson (actor born 1924)" 0 Elmer Bradley "Brad" Johnson (July 23, 1924 – April 4, 1981), was an American film and television actor, best remembered for his role as the deputy Lofty Craig on the 1950s Western series, Annie Oakley. After his last television appearance, in a 1967 episode of CBS's Gunsmoke, Johnson spent the remainder of his life as a real estate developer in Los Angeles, California. Elmer_Bradley_"_Brad_"_Johnson ( July_23_,_1924 – April_4 , 1981 ) , was an_American_film_and_television_actor , best remembered for his_role as the_deputy_Lofty_Craig on the_1950s_Western_series , Annie_Oakley . After his_last_television_appearance , in a_1967_episode of CBS 's_Gunsmoke , Johnson spent the_remainder of his_life as a_real_estate_developer in Los_Angeles , California .
